roleset.name: move forward or upward
roleset.note: ADVANCE-V NOTES: Based on big corpus and comparison with 'rise' and 'propose'. VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls calibratable_cos-45.6-1, escape-51.1, future_having-13.3, other_cos-45.4, promote-102. (from advance.01-v)

ADVANCE-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry advance.01, OntoNotes grouping advance-n senses 1,2,3,& 5; maps to VN entries calibratable_cos-45.6-1, escape-51.1-2, other_cos-45.4, promote-102. Framed by Claire. (from advance.01-n)

roles.note: arg5 here differs from verb frame which lacks attribute argument. (from advance.01-n)

role.descr: attribute of arg1, where this is advancing rather than whole

example.name: bellringing!
example.text: [Skilled ringers]-1 use their wrists *trace*-1 to advance or retard the next swing.

example.name: ergative
example.text: Tokyu Group, Mitsubishi Estates, and Bridgestone/Firestone's deal advanced Tuesday.
example.arg: Tokyu Group, Mitsubishi Estates, and Bridgestone/Firestone's deal

example.name: NP only, financial with args 2 & 4
example.text: an advance of 0.16 cent a pound to 14.27 cents

example.name: Args 1 & 4
example.text: The general noted the enemy's advance to the outskirts of the city.
example.arg: to the outskirts of the city.

example.name: Tmp and arg1 only
example.text: He discussed some recent advances in cancer treatments.

example.name: Arg 0 and MNR
example.text: Mary tried to ignore John's romantic advances.

example.name: Possessor as arg1
example.text: The dollar's recent advances against the euro have surprised investors.

example.name: NP only, with arg3
example.text: the advance from preliminaries to finals

example.name: Attribute (arg 5) advancing
example.text: For tobacco's advance in price, it was provided that no tobacco was to be exported from the colony until March.
